CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 17, 1952, pg. 3 reads: "Getting Vaccinated - "Small Fry" don't cry anymore when they get vaccinated. They're persuaded to sit and watch while they wait their turn.  Once the first child is convinced that the small scratch "won't hurt one bit," there's never a tear from the rest.  Little Sharon Simmons of 1907 Wylie Avenue is shown as she gets vaccinated at the Kay Club on Monday while the other youngsters watch.  She'll enter McKelvy School in September. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Boy getting vaccinated by woman, possibly nurse, in Kay Club with girl and boy seated in background
